Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

:::Orion/Hellbat/Starscream/Gigatron:::

::Orion, taking a cue from my other Maximals, unsheaths his sword and loads 
his missle launcher::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Hellbat flies to the CF for the battle::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Starscream transforms to robot mode when the ambush starts::
Starscream: Ah, is it already time to play?
::He fires 25 shots from one of his guns at rampage and 25 from his other gun 
at Tankor::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Gigatron holds back his tears at Child's words.  He was greatly loyal, 
wasnt he?  Ever since the day Defection landed on earth, he had spent his 
time unquestionably carrying out orders.  He wasnt expecting a reward, but he 
got one.  Now whenever he needed help, Child would be there::
Gigatron: Th-thank you. Farewell Child.  Till all are one!

--part1_11.cf99137.27683def_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>------------------------------------------------------------------------------<BR><BR>---------------------------------------------

<BR>::Starscream transforms to robot mode when the ambush starts::
<BR>Starscream: Ah, is it already time to play?
<BR>::He fires 25 shots from one of his guns at rampage and 25 from his other gun <BR>at Tankor::
<BR>------------------------------------------------------------------------------<BR><BR>---------------------------------------------
<BR>::Gigatron holds back his tears at Child's words.  He was greatly loyal, <BR>wasnt he?  Ever since the day Defection landed on earth, he had spent his <BR>time unquestionably carrying out orders.  He wasnt expecting a reward, but he <BR>got one.  Now whenever he needed help, Child would be there::
<BR>Gigatron: Th-thank you. Farewell Child.  Till all are one!</FONT></HTML>
